
#### **Modern Recipe App**


## Launch your development career with project-based coaching - [Forkify](https://forkify-js-page.netlify.app/)

***

**Build and Deploy Recipe Application With The Functionality of Adding Custom Recipe And Bookmark**. With Modern design, animations, the ability to add custom Recipe.

***

I used:
- HTML.
- SASS.
- Vanilla JAVASCRIPT.
